description: This file declares an interface class `IOmiProxy` within the `omi` namespace, representing a proxy for interacting with an omi_dbus_api. It provides methods for mounting and unmounting crypted bundles, and for registering and unregistering error listeners. The interface is designed to abstract the underlying API calls and signal handling related to OMI (Open Management Infrastructure).

classes.name: IOmiProxy
classes.description: Interface class providing methods to interact with OMI proxies, including bundle management and error listener registration.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given container ID, file paths, and returns the decrypted config JSON path.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts the crypted bundle corresponding to the provided container ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback and returns a listener ID.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered error listener by its ID.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
